sentences.english: When they go hunting,they live in tents of skin.
sentences.chinese: 他们出门打猎，就住在兽皮帐篷里。

sentences.english: It is made of animal skins.
Like Winamp, it supports extensions and skins feathers.
sentences.chinese: 像Winamp中，它支持的扩展和兽皮羽毛。

sentences.english: They dressed in animal skins, lived in caves or rude wooden huts.
sentences.chinese: 他们用兽皮遮体，住在洞穴或原始的小木屋里。

sentences.english: Hunks of desiccated skin and fat.
sentences.chinese: 大块大块脱水的兽皮和脂肪。

sentences.english: Mammoth hides were drawn over the timber and anchored with bones and stones.
sentences.chinese: 猛犸兽皮覆盖于木梁上，底部由石头和骨头固定。

sentences.english: This animal hide covered framework was partially supported and braced with woolly mammoth bones.
sentences.chinese: 这种兽皮覆盖的架构部分由羊毛包裹的猛犸骨骼支撑。

sentences.english: To hair the hides is one of the tanning processes.
sentences.chinese: 在制革过程中，除去兽皮上的毛是工序之一。

sentences.english: He tried gold mining, pearling and fur trapping.
sentences.chinese: 他尝试过淘金，采珍珠和猎兽皮。

sentences.english: After soaking, the hides unhair easily.
sentences.chinese: 兽皮经浸水以后毛便容易拔下来。

sentences.english: This will avoid any overdosing and any damage that may result from it.
sentences.chinese: 这样会避免因过量或流程的不同对兽皮的损害和影响。

sentences.english: Dated to about 15, 000 to 10, 000 BCE, this animal hide tent was suspended over a wooden framework and held down by stones.
sentences.chinese: 这种兽皮帐篷覆盖于木质框架上，下摆由石头固定。

definition: fur-lined changpao 長袍|长袍[chang2 pao2]
cloth and silk/cotton and silk textiles
